title: Valluvan Kuralil Sol Eduthen Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Valluvan kuralil sol eduthen
kamban kaviyil kavi eduthaen
elango variyil ezhil eduthaen
paaduvom naam aaduvom

malar indri vandu inam
magizhndhu vazhvadhillai
madhi indri mannulagam
nilaithu iruppadhillai

oli indri poo ulagam
selithu valarvathillai
ennai indri ennullam
sirithu magizhvadhillai

Valluvan kuralil sol eduthen
kamban kaviyil kavi eduthaen
elango variyil ezhil eduthaen
paaduvom naam aaduvom

thunai indri kodigal ellaam
thaaney padarvathillai
nadhi indri naadugal ellaam
valamaai irupathillai

kavi indri isai ellaam
thaenaai inippathillai
kalai indri thalai ullam
paalaai suvaipathillai
